attributes.action: organise a review of the so far completely unsatisfactory"Modernising Medical Careers" national recruitment process for doctors which is clearly disorganised and under-resourced.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The "Modernising Medical Careers" recruitment program that commenced in January has so far proved to be disorganised, unrealistic in it's execution and is clearly under-resourced . This was entirely foreseeable for all who are taking part. It has failed to inspire any confidence whatsoever that this will lead to a fair selection process. It will ultimately lead to the careers of many doctors being damaged beyond repair, and the culmination of many years of hard work going to waste - not to mention the money used to train them.
